name: Jumping Rack (A Spirits Game)
description: So you're Looking for a platformer Game? Well Your in the right Place! In this platformer Game There Are enemies if you don't touch them You will die, Jump On The enemies To get them away. When you die, the enemies the killed wont be there unless reopen The Game. (This is a Video game For the show spirits) here is the show link https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0OWUmuiOtRoq3rj9x3r7BA
